name: ai-platform
description: AI Platform with Gemini agents, context management, and tools

scripts.start:frontend: cd frontend && npm run tauri dev
scripts.dev:frontend: cd frontend && npm run tauri dev
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run tauri build
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm run tauri build
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/dist frontend/dist
